name: Three Inside Volume Confirmation Strategy
description: Candlestick-pattern strategy trading large-cap U.S. equities on daily bars. It goes long on a Three Inside Up formation with ≥10 % higher volume than the 20-day average and short on a Three Inside Down with the same volume confirmation. Entries occur at the close of the confirmation candle. Risk is capped at 1.2 % of equity per trade via ATR-based sizing and stops, with no more than four concurrent positions.
